name: Adirondack Repurposed Wood Chair
description:
Custom Handcrafted Reclaimed Wood Pallet Chairs made from re-purposed high quality wood pallets.

These chairs are stationary. They will be *shipped in pieces and include directions for you to put it together. All hardware is included. Only requires tools.

All items made in Salt Lake City Utah and are ONE OF A KIND and Made-to-Order. Each piece is custom and no two are alike.

Great option for indoor or outdoor use. Wood is natural but is treated for outdoor use.May be stained or painted with high quality Benjamin MooreÂ® Arborcoat Paint and Stain for a beautiful finish. A rainbow array of colors available. Please contact us for details and color availability.

*Shipping is determined by piece and by shipping destination.
